game: "Vertiges" (players 2) (equipment { (board (remove (square 12) vertices:{0 1 2 3 8 9 10 11 12 13 14 21 22 23 24 25 34 35 36 47 96 107 108 109 118 119 120 121 122 129 130 131 132 133 134 135 140..143} ) use:Vertex ) (piece "Marker" Each (move Slide All) ) }) (rules (start { (place "Marker1" {"A8" "A6" "L7" "L5" "F1" "G1" "E12" "H12" "I4" "D9"}) (place "Marker2" {"A7" "A5" "L8" "L6" "E1" "H1" "F12" "G12" "I9" "D4"}) }) (play (forEach Piece)) (end (if (is Line 5 All) (result Mover Win))) )
metadata: (info { (description "Vertiges is a vertical alignment game for two focused and strategic players.") (rules "To win, one of the two players must align 5 pieces of their color horizontally, vertically, or diagonally. At the beginning of the game, the pieces are placed on either side of the game board according to a specific pattern. In turn, a player moves a single piece of their color in any direction—horizontally, vertically, or diagonally—and by any number of spaces. Attention! You can only move one piece, in one direction, and it is forbidden to jump over a piece.") (id "4305") (version "1.3.14") (classification "board/space/line") (author "Eric Piette") (credit "Eric Piette") (date "2024") } ) (graphics { (board Background fillColour:(colour Black)) (player Colour P1 (colour Red)) (player Colour P2 (colour Yellow)) (show Edges Hidden) (piece Scale 0.5) })
